name: export georeferenced image
desc: Output a image in one of the following formats: BMP; TIF; JPG; and PNG. It will also output a world file that will allow the image to be placed correctly in applications that allow georeferencing.

properties.name: Image Filename
properties.desc: The image format to use when creating the image.

properties.name: Background Color
properties.desc: The Background color to use in the output image.

properties.name: Width
properties.desc: The width of the rendered portion of the georeferenced image, in pixels.

properties.name: Height
properties.desc: The height of the rendered portion of the georeferenced image, in pixels.
